did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Charles H. Warren was an attorney; superintendent and general manager of Almo Ranch Co. This collection includes correspondence, legal papers, and financial records relating to the Almo Ranch Company of Arizona, 1888-1891, and rental property in Tucson, Ariz., 1887-1900. Harriet E. Warren is the named owner on the Tucson property.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.p: Papers of Charles H. Warren (AZ 120). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Attorney; superintendent and general manager of Almo Ranch Co.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 2 series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, legal papers, and financial records relating to the Almo Ranch Company of Arizona, 1888-1891, and rental property in Tucson, Ariz., 1887-1900. Harriet E. Warren is the named owner on the Tucson property. Also includes material relating to mining and land claims in Arizona and property in Massachusetts; a conveyance of cattle and water rights from the Baboquivari Land and Live Stock Company, 1891; and a payroll for the Santa Rosa Mining Company, Tombstone, Ariz., June, 1883.
